question: The human body has an average, normal temperature of about 98.6ºF. To keep the core body temperature from becoming too high, the brain sends a signal to the body to
candidate_answers: (A) decrease sugar levels in the blood. (B) increase sugar levels in the blood. (C) decrease blood flow to the skin. (D) increase blood flow to the skin.
answer: decrease blood flow to the skin.
label: C
